description: AWS Route53 Recovery Control Routing Control resource schema .

RoutingControlArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the routing control.
RoutingControlArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the routing control.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

ControlPanelArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control panel.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the routing control. You can use any non-white space character in the name.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the routing control. You can use any non-white space character in the name.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 64   

Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: The deployment status of the routing control. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.
Status.markdownDescription:
The deployment status of the routing control. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.
